example_text: Either party may terminate this Lease Agreement for convenience upon thirty (30) days prior written notice. All obligations accrued prior to termination shall survive.
The lessor may terminate this agreement at its sole discretion. Early termination by the lessee shall result in immediate acceleration of all remaining lease payments.
Upon early termination, liquidated damages shall be assessed equal to the present value of all remaining payments plus administrative fees.
The parties agree that liquidated damages represent a reasonable estimate of loss and are not a penalty.
The lesseeâ€™s total aggregate liability shall not exceed the total amount of lease payments paid during the previous twelve (12) months.
Notwithstanding any limitation of liability, the lessee shall remain fully liable for losses arising from breach, negligence, or failure to maintain insurance.
The vehicle is warranted against defects in material and workmanship for a period of thirty-six (36) months or 36,000 miles.
Except as expressly stated, the vehicle is provided 'as is' and without any implied warranties.
The lessee shall maintain comprehensive and collision insurance coverage, naming the lessor as loss payee, for the duration of the lease.
Failure to maintain required insurance coverage shall constitute a material breach and grounds for immediate termination.
Written notice of intent not to renew must be provided no later than sixty (60) days prior to the expiration of the lease term.
The lessee shall not lease or operate any competing vehicle during the term of this agreement.
The lessee agrees not to make any statements that may reasonably be construed as disparaging to the lessor.
